titleStmt.title: The surfeit to A B C
titleStmt.author: King, Philip, 1602 or 3-1667.
Kynder, Philip, b. 1597.

notesStmt.note: "It was written, I believe, by Dr. Philip King, a younger son of Dr. John King, Bp. of London, and brother of Dr. Henry King, Bp. of Chichester. Ms. note by Malone in the Bodleian copy. But others ascribe the work to Philip Kynder, B.A."--Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
